histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.ExternalMetricsDropped
histogram.summary: The number of events that are dropped when processing External Metrics. Events are dropped once a threshold, 50 by default, is reached. This field is only recorded when recording is enabled.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.ExternalMetricsDropped2.{Project}
histogram.summary: The number of events that are dropped when processing External Metrics per project. Events are dropped once a threshold, 50 by default, is reached. This field is only recorded when recording is enabled.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.ExternalMetricsProduced2.{Project}
histogram.summary: The number of events that are produced by Platform2 per-project. This field is only recorded when recording is enabled.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.FlushedMap.Error
histogram.summary: Logs errors that occur in FlushedMap. This metric is captured when events are written to disk.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.FlushedMap.LoadedFlushedKeys
histogram.summary: The number of flushed keys loaded from the previous session. This is recorded once when the Structured Metrics is created.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.InitSequence
histogram.summary: Logged during StructuredMetricsService initialization whether the init task or the initial log timer completed first. The expectation is the vast majority of the time, the init task should complete first. If metrics show otherwise, then it may indicate there's a bug in the StructuredMetricsService init sequence and that it should be investigated.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.LogStore.CompressionRatio
histogram.summary: The compression ratio of Structured Metrics logs. Recorded when logs are stored.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.LogStore.Dropped
histogram.summary: The number of logs dropped for exceeding the log size constraints. Recorded when trimming the logs is complete and when the remaining logs is less then the original logs.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.LogStore.DroppedSize
histogram.summary: The size in KB of logs trimmed by log storage for being too large. Recorded when trimming the log and the compressed size of a log exceeds the max log size.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.OnExternalMetricsCollectedDuration
histogram.summary: Messures the duration of AshStructuredMetricsRecorder::OnExternalMetricsCollected in microseconds. Measuring to collect information about potential UI jankiness this function is causing.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.Reporting.ActualUploadInterval
histogram.summary: The actual interval between log upload start and previous log upload finished within the same process. A value of 0 indicates there was no previous upload.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.Reporting.HTTPErrorCode
histogram.summary: HTTP and network errors encountered by Structured Metrics when attempting to upload logs to the server through an HTTPS connection.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.Reporting.HTTPResponseCode
histogram.summary: HTTP response codes encountered by Structured Metrics when attempting to upload logs to the server through an HTTPS connection.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.Reporting.LogSize.OnSuccess
histogram.summary: Size in kilobytes (after compression) of an uploaded Structured Metrics log. Recorded after a successful Structured Metrics upload.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.Reporting.LogSize.RejectedSize
histogram.summary: Size in kilobytes (after compression) of a log rejected for being to large.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.DeletedBufferWhenOverQuota
histogram.summary: The number of flushed event buffers that were deleted when our disk quota was exceeded. Recorded when flushed event buffers are deleted.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.DiskQuotaExceededDelta
histogram.summary: The number of Kibibytes the disk quota was exceeded by when buffers were deleted. This should be proportional to the number of event buffers deleted. This metric is recorded when Structured Metrics exceeds its disk space quota and must delete events.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.Flush
histogram.summary: The result of flushing an in-memory event buffer to disk. Captures success and errors when an event buffer is flushed.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.FlushedBuffersAtUpload
histogram.summary: The number of flushed buffers when an upload occurs. Currently, all flushed events are read at upload so this correlates to how many buffers were flushed since the last upload. If that behaivor changes then a new histogram needs to be created for the number of read buffers. This is recorded when events are uploaded.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.InMemoryEventsAtUpload
histogram.summary: The number of in-memory events read when an upload occurs. This is recorded when events are uploaded.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.MaxDiskDizeKB
histogram.summary: The max amount of disk space flushed events can consume. This is recorded when the Storage Manager is created.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.MaxMemorySizeKB
histogram.summary: The max amount of memory in-memory events can consume. This is recorded when the Storage Manager is created.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.StorageManager.RecordStatus
histogram.summary: Records the status of an event recording. This is recorded when an event is added to the StorageManager.

histogram.name: StructuredMetrics.UploadSize
histogram.summary: The serialized size in bytes of the Structured Metrics payload attached to UMA. This correlates to the amount of memory Structured Metrics uses during an upload by UMA.
